radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Total thyroidectomy with central neck dissection
radiographic_examinations.findings: Histopathology revealed a 1-mm focus of MTC within the right thyroid lobe with multifocal C cell hyperplasia in a background of Hashimotoâ€™s thyroiditis. Seventeen lymph nodes were negative for tumor.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Calcitonin values remained normal with no evidence of pheochromocytoma or hyperparathyroidism after 1 yr of follow-up.
